attributes.title: actual cannibal shia labeouf
attributes.review:
you’re walking in the woods 🚶

there’s no one around and your phone is dead 💀 

out of the corner of your eye you spot him 👀

shia labeouf 👨🏻

he’s following you about 30 feet back 👁👄👁

he gets down on all fours and breaks into a sprint 🏃🏻‍♂️💨

he’s gaining on you 👥

shia labeouf 👨🏻

you’re looking for your car but you’re all turned around 🚗

he’s almost upon you now🕴🏻

and you can see there’s blood on his face🩸

my god there’s blood everywhere! 💉

running for your life (from shia labeouf) 🏃

he’s brandishing a knife (it’s shia labeouf)🔪

lurking in the shadows 👤

hollywood superstar shia labeouf 👨🏻

living in the woods (shia labeouf)🌲

killing for sport (shia labeouf) 😵

eating all the bodies 🍽

actual cannibal shia labeouf 😱

now it’s dark and you seem to have lost him 😅

but you’re hopelessly lost yourself 😰

stranded with a murderer 😬

you creep silently through the underbrush 🤫

aha! in the distance 🤨

a small cottage with a light on💡

hope! you move stealthily toward it🧍

but your leg! ah! it’s caught in a bear trap! 😱

gnawing off your leg (quiet quiet)🦵

limping to the cottage (quiet quiet) 🤭

now you’re on the doorstep 🏠

sitting inside: shia labeouf 👨🏻🪑

sharpening an axe (shia labeouf) 🪓

but he doesn’t hear you enter (shia labeouf)🦻🏽

you’re sneaking up behind him 🙇

strangling superstar shia labeouf 👐

fighting for your life with shia labeouf 👊

wrestling a knife from shia labeouf 🔪

stab him in his kidney 🩹

safe at last from shia labeouf 😌

you limp into the dark woods🕺

blood oozing from your stump leg🩸

you have beaten 🤜🏽🤛🏽

shia labeouf 👨🏻

wait! he isn’t dead! shia surprise! 🤯

there’s a gun to your head and death in his eyes🔫

but you can do jiu jitsu ✋🏽

body slam superstar shia labeouf 💪🏽

legendary fight with shia labeouf ⚔️

normal tuesday night for shia labeouf 💁🏻‍♂️

you try to swing an axe at shia labeouf 🪓

but blood is draining fast from your stump leg 😓

he’s dodging every swipe, he parries to the left ⬅️

you counter to the right, you catch him in his neck😈

you’re chopping off his head now ⛏

you have just decapitated shia labeouf 👨🏻

his head topples to the floor, expressionless 😐

you fall to your knees and catch your breath 🌬

you’re finally safe from shia labeouf 😁

attributes.title: This is a cursed communist app!
attributes.review: This orange thing cant spell coffee, he spells it as “confefe”. The orange thing has forced many women to have abortions.... but his mother should've aborted him? That’s hypocritical! He also smells very bitter, like old poop, I think Pence forgot to wipe him? Please remove this app, upon opening the app, it told me to get naked THE GOVERNMENT IS SPYING ON ME!! I feel offended and harassed when I go through the app, it told me to sign up. THIS IS COMMUNISM. WHY SHOULD I PROVIDE MY NAME? I AM A TAX PAYING AMERICAN YET I AM BEING FORCED TO PROVIDE MY NAME FOR AN APP OF THE ORANGE THING? This goes to show that the government is looking for us so they can stamp orange stickers on our foreheads. 2 minutes after getting the app, my daughter got corona virus ad turned orange, this is definitely a cursed communist app. DELETE THE APP! DELETE THE APP! DELETE THE APP! DELETE THE APP!

attributes.title: no😘 it was terrible✨🥺❤️
attributes.review: i was so excited for this app😌 (not rlly🥰) so i downloaded it. but when i did my turtle didn’t want to eat anymore😨. and two days later my cat lost her tail😓. it honestly took me so long to help her find her tail again. and i thought the bad luck was over. but just when i thought everything was ok again my cat lost her ears🤬‼️. i don’t know how that happened but than a week later, my fish drowned😡. i realized that all this happened after i downloaded this app so i decided to delete this. and seconds after deleting this app everything went back to normal😚. if i could give a zero rating i would because this app is terrible✨❤️. it gave me such bad luck. if you’re reading this and want to get this app, don’t😚🧚🏻‍♀️. it’s so bad and is also constructed really badly😪💖.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
So first off, I’m a horrible liberal ❄️, so don’t listen to a word I have to say because any trump supporter knows that ignorance is bliss 💕✨but when I opened the app I nearly had a heart attack! Right in front of me was a horrifying picture of a spray tanned Cheeto with some of that yellow troll hair on top! Once I recovered I found that my entire phone was now slightly orange, and over the course of a few hours it became completely orange. 
Eventually I went to delete the app, but it wouldn’t let me! It told me that if I wanted to get rid of the app, I had to yell racial slurs at any minorities I came across. It also sent me notifications telling me to “go back to the kitchen” or calling me a “dishwasher”. 
This wasn’t anything I haven’t heard before, so it didn’t faze me. Then I learned that TikTok was going to be banned, and since I’ve been brainwashed by the Chinese government running the app, I started having convulsions due to the conflict in my brain between the brainwashing of TikTok and the overpowering app that I am now reviewing. To finish it all, the two apps I had installed in my phone were at war with each other both within my technology and in the deep recesses of my mind.
Through all of the Gabbie Hanna songs and alm rants, I managed to delete the app. However, I still feel the after affects and my family has suffered from the hatred of the LGBTQ+ community that is now implanted in my skull.
Overall, -♾/10.
Not a vibe.
Using this app feels like putting on wet socks.
Anyways, ✨🧚💖Charli D’Amelio 2020💓🧚✨
